121.content:
Dave woke up one morning, not feeling much different. For a moment he panicked at the sight of sunlight hitting the sheets, but then he remembered it was a Sunday.

His wife, Sarah, was still sleeping next to him. He cuddled up to her, but she just kept snoring. Her thigh pressing against his morning wood, he was starting to feel frisky. It wasn't long before she was awake.

"Good morning." She yawned, smacking her lips before she continued. "You're horny again, aren't you. Wait until tonight." She turned away from him. He slid closer.

"Aww. But honey..." he tried, but faltered.
"You love my cock inside you, right?" He tried again.

"Yeees. Tonight." She grunted.

"But I'm hard now." He hissed, trying to sound seductive. "It makes no difference whether we do it now or tonight."

"I... that's true..." She hesitated, unable to contradict despite the fact she was certain a moment ago there were several things that made a difference. Somehow they didn't matter anymore. She didn't really care about being fresh and clean for sex anymore. It was dirty anyway. Neither did she mind his usually smelly morning breath, not to mention the smell that was coming from his crotch. Not even the creeping feeling that everybody she'd meet that day would know she had sex. Like they could smell it, or something. It was all fine, let them think whatever.

Feeling her resolve fade away, he crept closer against her, maneuvering his dick against the split between her butt-cheeks. He was thinking up more reasons, hoping she'd buckle. What did he say?
121.title: Sarah

1211.content:

1211.title: nutritious breakfast

12112.content:
Sarah went into the bathroom, freshening up. Dave was starting to feel peckish, so he got dressed and went down to the kitchen for something to eat. Pouring himself a bowl of cereal, he went to the TV. The kids had put the news on, but neither Jason nor Tara was really watching. Both too engrossed by their phones at the moment. He wished them a good morning, sat down lacking any reply and switched to something about motor-sports. Contentedly munching away at his cornflakes while watching cars go brrrt, this was a very good Sunday so far.

When Sarah came down a little while later he nearly spilled his milk. Wearing nothing but some daisy dukes and a tank top that seemed made to spill, it was pretty obvious she wasn't going to church. Not that they did that anymore, not since they moved here. Even so, she had always kept her Sunday dresses for Sundays. Usually wearing proper, not exactly formal but plenty motherly clothing like sweaters, slacks and the occasional pair of jeans, she wasn't exactly the one to show off her curves.

But now. Bare legged, no underwear, generous cleavage and heavily perfumed. She strutted her junk across the living room, not even giving either Jason or Tara a glance. She stopped in front of Dave, winking at him before settling in front of his chair, snugly between his legs.

"Oh my god. How is that even comfortable?" Tara shot out in annoyance at the display of intimacy. "Didn't you get enough of that just now?" Then softer. "Don't think we didn't hear you, dad."

"Don't be silly, pumpkin." Sarah replied without missing a beat. "I'm your daddy's cum dumpster slut. Of course I'm comfortable between his legs."

"I- You- What?" Tara was befuddled. Jason looked up from his phone with a frown. "Cum dumpster? Dad?"

"I, er... that is- Yeah." Dave, red from ear to ear from what his daughter said, wasn't really prepared for Sarah's reply. So he went with it anyway. "Yeah you heard her... She's my little cum dumpster slut. So?"

"Oh. Ok." Satisfied with the answer, both Tara and Jason went back to their phones as if nothing was out the ordinary. Then, Tara added as an afterthought "Just keep it to the bedroom, please?"

Dave's mind was racing. Looking from Sarah, who was snuggling closer to his crotch with each snuggle, to his kids, who had just taken his word for granted. This was getting absurd. He had to try something.

121123.title: Something else

1211232.content:
"Oh hahaha. Honey..." Dave quickly grabbed both bowls, handing them back to Sarah. "That's not for the kids. Just women who are... unrelated." He stumbled.

"Oh. I see" She took the bowls to the kitchen, completely embarrassed. He turned to the slackjawed pair sitting at the table.

"It was just a joke. You know how gullible your mom is..." Holding up his hands in pardon.

"Ha ha." Tara huffed dryly. Jason still looking horrified at the thought of sperm for breakfast.

As soon as the kids were back to their phones, Dave went after his wife to stop her from doing more crazy shit like that. He found her leaning against the kitchen counter. She had poured both bowls into a larger dish. Holding it against her belly, she couldn't help spilling some of the gooey white stuff on her chest as she ladled it up.

"What?" She said. "I can't let it go to waste, can I? "

"Don't worry, there's more where that came from." Dave heard himself say as she continued slobbering up the stuff. "So... got anything planned for today?"

"I was thinking on asking Beverly to meet up, but honestly I'm down for whatever you want." She let out a small belch, giggling at herself.

"Hey Mom. I've done my homework, cleaned my room and did all chores. Can I go out?" Jason Rushed

"Already? Sure." She smiled blankly.

"Oh. And can I have 50 bucks for... supplies?" He continued, eyeing dad guiltily.

"Sure. Wallet's in my coat. Take whatever you need, have fun!" She waved him out the door.

Dave had no trouble believing it as it all played out in front of him. She had become the epicenter of gullible. Sooo, did he fix things or make them much, much worse?

info.brief_description: you gain the ability tell people anything about them and they'd believe it to be true.
info.description:
You wake up one morning to discover that you have the ability to suggest or state to someone anything about themselves or others and they would believe it to have been always true.

cast:
Sarah Mitchell- 38 yr. old stay at home mom and house wife.
David Mitchell- 40 yr. old office manager, father, loving husband.
Mary Mitchell- 18yr. daughter oldest child part of the popular crowd at school likes to tease her younger siblings.
Jason Mitchell- 17 yr. son not popular but well like by most.
Tara Mitchell- 15yr. youngest daughter super smart, pretty like Mary but doesn't get along with her, friends with her brother.

Feel free to add characters i.e. friends, family, enemies, ect.. .
Rules:
No killing.
Other than that have fun. please add.
